Sentence.sentence: While rich parents are more concerned with their children's psychological well-being, poor parents are more worried about their children's safety.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The retail giant said the poor financial performance this year has pushed it to begin implementing $400 million in cost-cutting measures.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The lives of children from rich and poor American families look more different than ever before.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The increasing differences in child rearing between rich and poor families reflect growing social inequality.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The cycle continues: Poorer parents have less time and fewer resources to invest in their children, which can leave children less prepared for school and work, which leads to lower earnings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The company blamed much of the poor performance in November and December on unseasonably warm weather.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Nonetheless, 20% of well-off parents say their children's schedules are too hectic, compared with 8% of poorer parents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Less-educated parents, and poorer and black and Latino parents are more likely to believe that there is no such thing as too much involvement in a child's education.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In poor families, meanwhile, children tend to spend their time at home or with extended family.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Direct subsidies to research and development have been adopted by some governments but are a poor substitute for a carbon price: they do only part of the job, leaving in place market incentives to over-use fossil fuels and thereby add to the stock of atmospheric greenhouse gases without regard to the collateral ( ' , 附带的) costs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But 50% of poor parents say it is extremely important to them that their children earn a college degree, compared with 39% of wealthier parents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: American parents, whether rich or poor, have similar expectations of their children despite different ways of parenting.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: While the practice carries serious health risks for many, those dangers are outweighed by the social and economic gains for poor urban farmers and consumers who need affordable food.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The report focused on poor urban areas, where farms in or near cities supply relatively inexpensive food.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Poor countries will have to bear the cost for rich nations' economic development.

Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In other words, poor and rich both over-exploit the natural world, but for different reasons.

Sentence.sentence: Examples show that both rich and poor countries exploited the environment for economic progress.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Clearly, richer societies are able to provide environmental improvements which lie well beyond the reach of poorer communities.

Sentence.sentence: But there are also many examples of growing wealth by trashing the environment, in rich and poor parts of the world alike, whether through unregulated mineral extraction, drastic water use for agriculture, slash-and-burn farming, or fossil-fuel-guzzling ( ' ,  大量消耗) transport.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As countries become richer, they produce more greenhouse gases; and the impact of those gases will fall primarily in poor parts of the world.

Sentence.sentence: And the World Resources Institute ( ' , WRI) in its World Resources 2005 report, issued at the end of August, produced several such examples from Africa and Asia; it also demonstrated that environmental degradation affects the poor more than the rich, as poorer people derive a much higher proportion of their income directly from the natural resources around them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Now, a new study that began with about 1,000 children in New Zealand has tracked how a child’s low self-control can predict poor health, money troubles and even a criminal record in their adult years.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: There's a lot for students to complain about: the repayment threshold for paying back loans will be frozen for five years, meaning that lower-paid graduates have to start repaying their loans; and maintenance grants have been replaced by loans, meaning that students from poorer backgrounds face higher debt than those with wealthier parents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The 83% of American employees who are stressed about their jobs – up from 73% just a year  before – say that poor compensation and an unreasonable workload are their number-one sources of stress.

Sentence.sentence: So what factors, at the community level, do predict if poor children will move up the economic ladder as adults? What explains, for instance, why the Salt Lake City metro area is one of the 100 largest metropolitan areas most likely to lift the fortunes of the poor and the Atlanta metro area is one of the least likely?Harvard economist Raj Chetty has pointed to economic and racial segregation, community density, the size of a community's middle class, the quality of schools, community religiosity, and family structure, which he calls the single strongest correlate of upward mobility.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Per-capita local government spendingIn other words, communities with high levels of per-capita income growth, high percentages of two-parent families, and high local government spending—which may stand for good schools— are the most likely to help poor children relive Horatio Alger's rags-to-riches story.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is better to start from the community to help poor children move up the social ladder.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Inequality is dangerous, he argued, not merely because it doesn't look good to have a large gap between the rich and the poor, but because inequality itself destroys upward mobility, making it harder for the poor to escape from poverty.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Chetty finds that communities like Salt Lake City, with high levels of two-parent families and religiosity, are much more likely to see poor children get ahead than communities like Atlanta, with high levels of racial and economic segregation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A number of prominent economists have also argued that it's harder for the poor to climb the economic ladder today because the rungs（横档） in that ladder have grown farther apart.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"坏的"之意。
means: bad ： 含义广泛，指任何不好的或不合需要的品质。
evil ： 语气比bad强，强调道德上的邪恶不良，含狡猾凶险或危害他人的意味。
ill与evil意义接近，但语气弱一些，常指道德或性质方面的不良。
poor ： 普通用词，侧重指事物的质量或数量低于标准或不合要求。用于指天气与食品时可与bad通用。
wicked ： 语气比evil强，指居心叵测，任意违反道德标准，有意作恶。

means.word_mean: 贫困的, 贫穷的, 贫寒, 清贫

sentences.en: Many poor people gathered at the gate.
sentences.cn: 许多穷苦人聚集在门口。

sentences.en: The village used to be poor.
sentences.cn: 这个村庄过去很穷。

sentences.en: She is too poor to satisfy her family's material needs.
sentences.cn: 她太穷了, 无法满足家人的物质需要。

means.word_mean: 贫乏的; 缺乏; 缺少

sentences.en: The farm is a very poor one.
sentences.cn: 这个农场贫瘠得很。

means.word_mean: 低劣的; 次等的; 劣质的; 差的; 次的

sentences.en: An actor who mouths his lines is a poor actor.
sentences.cn: 装腔作势背台词的演员不是好演员。

sentences.en: My handwriting is poorer than hers.
sentences.cn: 我的字还不如她的。

sentences.en: He's still in poor health after his illness.
sentences.cn: 病好后他的身体仍很弱。

means.word_mean: 可怜的; 不幸的; 令人同情的

sentences.en: The poor old man had lost both his sons in the war.
sentences.cn: 这位不幸的老人在战争中失去了两个儿子。

phrase.cizu_name: (as) poor as a church mouse (或 as church mice)

jx.jx_en_mean: a wealthy young person whose money brings them no contentment (often used as an expression of mock sympathy)
jx.jx_cn_mean: [常用来表示含嘲弄语气的同情]可怜的小富哥（或妹）

jx.jx_en_mean: an inferior or cheaper substitute for the thing specified
jx.jx_cn_mean: 较劣质的（或较便宜的）替代品

lj.lj_ly: corduroy has always been the poor man's velvet.
lj.lj_ls: 灯芯绒一直是天鹅绒的便宜替代品。

jx.jx_en_mean: a person or thing that is considered inferior or subordinate to others of the same type or group
jx.jx_cn_mean: 无名小卒，微不足道的人（或东西）

lj.lj_ly: for many years radio has been the poor relation of the media.
lj.lj_ls: 多年来收音机一直是媒体中微不足道的一种形式。

entry.def: Someone who is poor has very little money and few possessions.

example.ex: The reason our schools cannot afford better teachers is because people here are poor...
example.tran: 我们的学校请不起好老师的原因是因为这里的人穷。

example.ex: He was one of thirteen children from a poor family.
example.tran: 他是13名来自贫困家庭的孩子之一。

entry.def: The people in a poor country or area have very little money and few possessions.

example.ex: Many countries in the Third World are as poor as they have ever been.
example.tran: 很多第三世界国家仍和过去一样穷困。

example.ex: ...a settlement house for children in a poor neighborhood.
example.tran: 为贫民区儿童设立的街坊文教馆

entry.def: You use poor to express your sympathy for someone.

example.ex: I feel sorry for that poor child...
example.tran: 我为那个可怜的孩子感到难过。

example.ex: Poor chap — he was killed in an air crash...
example.tran: 不幸的家伙，他死于空难。

entry.def: If you describe something as poor, you mean that it is of a low quality or standard or that it is in bad condition.

example.ex: The flat was in a poor state of repair...
The gap between the best and poorest childcare provision in the European Union has widened...
example.tran: 欧盟最好和最差的儿童保育服务之间的差距扩大了。

entry.def: If you describe an amount, rate, or number as poor, you mean that it is less than expected or less than is considered reasonable.
entry.tran: （数量、比率等）不理想的，不合理的

example.tran: 低薪和恶劣的工作条件

entry.def: You use poor to describe someone who is not very skilful in a particular activity.

example.ex: Hospitals are poor at collecting information.
example.tran: 医院收集信息能力很差。

entry.def: If something is poor in a particular quality or substance, it contains very little of the quality or substance.

example.ex: Fats and sugar are very rich in energy but poor in vitamins, minerals and dietary fibre.
example.tran: 脂肪和糖类热量很高，但维生素、矿物质和膳食纤维贫乏。

sentences.sentence: "they improved the quality from mediocre to above average"
"the shabby room struck her as extraordinarily pathetic"- Galsworthy

means.word_mean: 3. having little money or few possessions;

sentences.sentence: "deplored the gap between rich and poor countries"
"the proverbial poor artist living in a garret"

means.word_mean: 4. characterized by or indicating lack of money;
6. badly supplied with desirable qualities or substances;

sentences.sentence: "the area was poor in timber and coal"

means.word_mean: 7. not sufficient to meet a need;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French poure, from Latin pauper

sentences.cn: 他们穷得没钱给孩子买鞋穿。
sentences.en: They were too poor to buy shoes for the kids.

sentences.en: We aim to help the poorest families.

sentences.en: Have you heard about poor old Harry? His wife's left him.

sentences.en: Fats and sugar are very rich in energy but poor in vitamins, minerals and dietary fibre.

sentences.en: ...soil that is poor in zinc.

sentences.cn: 因此，如果不进行政治改革，贫穷国家就不可能挑出贫穷的牢笼，而政治改革只有通过广泛的正规教育才可能实现。
sentences.en: Thus poor countries might not be able to escape their poverty traps without political changes that may be possible only with broader formal education.

sentences.cn: 该报告主要关注的是一些贫穷的城市地区，这些地区的农场位于城市内或者在城市附近，可以提供相对便宜的食物。
sentences.en: The report focused on poor urban areas, where farms in or near cities supply relatively inexpensive food.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在贫穷的干旱地区，未经处理的废水是唯一可以使用的灌溉水源，否则农民将无法从事农业生产。
sentences.en: In poor, dry regions, untreated wastewater is the only viable irrigation source to keep farmers in business.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 诚然，不是所有的美国学生都能比得上外国学生。但是美国学校确实会为富裕和贫穷的家庭提供实现他们潜能的同等机会。
sentences.en: True, not all U.S. students can match the performance of their foreign counterparts, but the American institutions do offer students from rich and poor families alike the chance to realize their full potential.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 现在, 这些本来就贫穷的人完全没有了赚钱的法子.
sentences.en: Now , these people , already quite poor, have no way to earn money.

sentences.cn: 但是由于底子太薄, 现在中国仍然是世界上很贫穷的国家之一.
sentences.en: Nonetheless , because of our low starting point, China is still one of the world's poor countries.

sentences.cn: 研究已经照亮解释这些贫穷的结果的沮丧的生理和行为的效应.
sentences.en: Research has illuminated the physiological and behavioral effects of depression that accounts for these poor outcomes.

sentences.cn: 贫穷的 、 农村的、未受教育或受到很少教育的人们就被排斥在外.
sentences.en: The poor, rural and uneducated or those with little education are left out.

sentences.cn: 你也可以注意到富有的只会越来越富有,而贫穷的只会越来越贫穷.
sentences.en: You could also notice that the rich gets richer and poor gets poorer.

sentences.cn: 很久以前有一个贫穷的农民名叫费雷德.
sentences.en: Long ago, there was a poor farmer called Fred.

sentences.cn: 小燕子,我浑身都是金叶子,你一定要一片一片剥下来,把它们送给我贫穷的子民.
sentences.en: Leaf after leaf the fine gold the Swallow picked off and took to the poor.

sentences.cn: 不过,作为中美洲最贫穷的国家,尼加拉瓜难以日渐繁荣.
sentences.en: But as the poorest country in Central America Nicaragua is hardly prospering.

sentences.cn: 这贫穷的女人必须拍卖掉她全部的珠宝.
sentences.en: The poor woman had to auction off all her jewelry.

sentences.cn: 在很多国家中,最富有的人群和最贫穷的人群之间存在着巨大的不平等.
sentences.en: Huge inequalities exist between the richest and poorest within many countries.

sentences.cn: 贫穷的妇女倾向于多生孩子, 这也大大地增加了她们的负担.
sentences.en: Poor women tend to have more children, which adds considerably to their chores.

sentences.cn: 该国家是世界上最贫穷的国家之一.
sentences.en: It is of the poorest in the world.

sentences.cn: 山谷里发现了黄金,这会使这个贫穷的山区富起来.
sentences.en: The discovery of gold in the valleys will enrich the poor area.

sentences.cn: 富裕世界的低利率会把代价强加于较贫穷的国家.
sentences.en: Low interest rates in the rich world can impose costs on poorer countries.

sentences.cn: 孩子是最贫穷的富翁, 最无知的智者, 最无忌的哲人.
sentences.en: Children are the poorest millionaire, the most ignorant wise , the most Moji wise.

sentences.cn: 那个贫穷的老人住在一间小木屋内.
sentences.en: The poor old man lived in a little wooden hut.

sentences.cn: 尽管他们已经搬过十二次家, 但总是停留在贫穷的乡间.
sentences.en: For all the twelve movings, they had sojourned until now in a poor country.

sentences.cn: 汤姆是一个贫穷的人,是一个可怜的乞丐.
sentences.en: Tom was a paupera poor beggar.

sentences.cn: 然而,比较昂贵的煤油将使贫穷的人们深受其害 ( 更无须提及政局的选举前景了 ).
sentences.en: Yet more expensive kerosene would hurt the poor ( not to mention the government's own electoral prospects ).

sentences.cn: 我从前是一个靠打渔为生的家庭贫穷的渔民.
sentences.en: I used to be a fisherman a poor family that depended only on fishing.

sentences.cn: 另一个故事是关于一个贫穷的樵夫.
sentences.en: Another story is about a poor woodsman.

sentences.cn: 上帝派来帮助这个贫穷的伐木工.
sentences.en: God sent him to help the poor woodcutter.

sentences.cn: 这是贫穷的英国之吉兆, 是 吗 ?
sentences.en: A good omen for poor English, eh?

sentences.cn: 现在尚不清楚的是这些特别提款权是否会从富裕的国家转向贫穷的国家.
sentences.en: It is not clear whether this can be redirected from rich countries to poor ones.

sentences.cn: 他们父子在一个农庄最贫穷的人家里住了一天一宿.
sentences.en: They spent a day and a night in the farm of a very poor family.

sentences.cn: 在那个贫穷的农民眼里, 超级市场藏有巨大的财富.
sentences.en: To the poor peasant, the supermarket was an Aladdin's cave.

sentences.cn: 自然资源贫乏的国家
sentences.en: a country poor in natural resources

sentences.cn: 不良的灌溉和运输条件, 以及贫乏的教育和医疗状况,都增加了农民们受灾的可能性.
sentences.en: Poor irrigation, transport, education, and medicine multiplied the chances of disaster for the peasants.

sentences.cn: 承认自己灵性贫乏的人多么有福啊; 他们是天国的子民!
sentences.en: Blessed the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

sentences.cn: 贫乏的合作造成的办公差异使本来就成问题的安排变得更加的不合理.
sentences.en: Poor communication exacerbated an already problematic arrangement with the between office cultures.

sentences.cn: 肯尼亚是一个矿产资源贫乏的农业国.
sentences.en: Kenya is the agricultural country with poor resource of a mineral products.

sentences.cn: 今天报纸上的社论茅头指向总统贫乏的表现.
sentences.en: The editorial in today's paper took aim at the president's poor performance.

sentences.cn: 那些石油矿产贫乏的非洲国家同样在进行着储备.
sentences.en: And poorer African countries less endowed with oil or minerals are also saving up.

sentences.cn: 但是, 事实上,这种确定性所提供的也可以说是最抽象、最贫乏的真理.
sentences.en: This bare fact of certainty, however, is and admittedly the abstractest and poorest kind of truth.

sentences.cn: 就自然资源来说,它是西欧最贫乏的国家之一.
sentences.en: In terms of natural resources it is one of the poorest countries in Western Europe.

sentences.cn: 他甚至对检察官贫乏的时尚品位品头论足.
sentences.en: He even scolded the prosecutor for her poor taste in fashion.

sentences.cn: 它饿了，这可怜的小家伙。
sentences.en: It's hungry─the poor little thing.

sentences.cn: 我为那个可怜的孩子感到难过。
sentences.en: I feel sorry for that poor child...

sentences.cn: 普利斯特里解释了其助理的毛衫所采用的深蓝色是如何逐年过时的：从时装展销到百货商店，最后出现在打折区。毫无疑问，这可怜的女孩就是从打折区淘来了这件衣服。
sentences.en: Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the assistant's sweater descended over the years from fashion shows to department stores and to the bargain bin in which the poor girl doubtless found her garment.

sentences.cn: 卖方可以每吨70美元开具该货的发票, 请在装船后给我公司开具发票.
sentences.en: The seller may invoice the goods at $ 70 per ton. Invoice us after the shipment.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 口语

sentences.cn: 那可怜的人遭到暴徒的痛打.
sentences.en: The poor man received a savage beating from the thugs.

sentences.cn: 她又饿又冷,哆哆 嗦嗦 地向前走着,这是一幅非常凄惨的景象: 可怜的小姑娘!
sentences.en: Trembling with cold and hunger crept she on & def the picture of sorrow: poor little child!

sentences.cn: 这些可怜的孩子依偎在一块取暖.
sentences.en: The poor children nestled up together for warmth.

sentences.cn: 你在对这个可怜的, 没妈的孩子干些 什么 ?
sentences.en: What are you doing to this poor, motherless child?

sentences.cn: 这可怜的孩子闻到了香喷喷的肉味.
sentences.en: The poor boy smelled the delicious odour of cooked meat.

sentences.cn: 可怜的小汉斯掉到深沟里死了.
sentences.en: Poor little Hans fell down into a deep ditch and was at rest.

sentences.cn: 后来他终于极不情愿地朝家走去, 他那可怜的脑瓜子里充满了各种各样的幻想.
sentences.en: Finally he strode home reluctantly, with his poor head full of visions.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 汤姆历险

sentences.cn: 可怜的猪仔啊,它们看起来那么友善,不知死之将至.
sentences.en: Poor piggies. So friendly and yet unaware of their imminent demise.

sentences.cn: 可怜的吉姆, 他最近处在一个两难的抉择里.
sentences.en: Poor Jim, recently he's been stuck between a rock and a hard place.

sentences.cn: 我躲闪开了, 但是可怜的比尔却在后脖子上挨了一下.
sentences.en: I dodged, but poor Bill got it in the back of his neck.

sentences.cn: 说着, 狼一口把可怜的小红帽给吞了.
sentences.en: With these words, the wolf swallowed up poor Little Red Cap.

sentences.cn: 这可怜的妇女为能跟他的两个被骗子拐走的儿子团聚一堂,感到喜出望外.
sentences.en: The poor woman was extremely happy to be reunited with her two sons who had been carried off by a swindler.

sentences.cn: 那个可怜的女人已沦为乞丐.
sentences.en: The poor woman is reduced to begging.

sentences.cn: 我可怜的历史 啊 !我认为在今晚我还有很多工作要做!
sentences.en: Louis : My poor history! I think I still have a lot to work on tonight!

sentences.cn: 可怜的约翰总是成为他们开玩笑的对象.
sentences.en: Poor John was the butt of all their jokes.

sentences.cn: 那部电影一上演,可怜的导演就成为了批评家们批判的对象.
sentences.en: The poor director became the Aunt Sally to critics soon after that flim was on show.

sentences.cn: 那可怜的小心房充斥着绝望与忧伤.
sentences.en: Poor little heart all black'n'blue.

sentences.cn: 卢辛达: 噢, 可怜的汤姆. 那他得上石膏了, 是 吗 ?
sentences.en: Lucinda : Oh, poor Tom. He'll have to have a cast put on, won't he?

sentences.cn: 这可怜的孩子被吓呆了.
sentences.en: The poor child was petrified with fear.

sentences.cn: 可怜的他已经处在工作重压下,忙得不可开交了.
sentences.en: Poor him, he is snowed under with work.

sentences.cn: 这阵富于感情的声音显然使可怜的女郎从恍恍惚惚的惊恐状态中惊醒.
sentences.en: Apparently the expressive sound of human feeling recalled the poor girl from the stupor of fear.

sentences.cn: 他为这可怜的女人所作的请求蛮好 吧 ?
sentences.en: Hath he not pleaded well for the poor woman?

sentences.cn: 你瞧瞧这些可怜的螃蟹、蝌蚪, 他们怎能跟我比?
sentences.en: Look at these poor crabs and tadpoles, How can they compare with me?

sentences.cn: 我希望你没有驱使那个可怜的男孩工作过度.
sentences.en: I hope you're not overworking that poor boy.

sentences.cn: 她把那个可怜的男孩打得遍体鳞伤.
sentences.en: She beat the poor boy black and blue.

sentences.cn: 其失败可归结于许多因素, 包括匮乏的市场 、 薄弱的管理和苍白的计划.
sentences.en: This failure rate is attributed to many things, including poor marketing, poor management and poor planning.

sentences.cn: 匮乏的生活尚可以改善, 匮乏的灵魂则难以修补.
sentences.en: POOR living could be improved, poor soul could not be repaired.

sentences.cn: 富有的人是优秀的接受者, 穷人是低劣的接受者.
sentences.en: Rich people are excellent receivers, poor people are poor receivers.

sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 低劣的bug报告是一个典型错误.
sentences.en: Unfortunately, poor bug reporting is a classic mistake.

sentences.cn: 由于缺乏管理才能以及低劣的领导力,他被给了低分.
sentences.en: He was marked down for his lack of organizational abilities and poor leadership skills.

sentences.cn: 而Bricklin自己造的车子由于低劣的质量也失败了.
sentences.en: And the Bricklin car itself was destined to fail, due to its poor quality.

sentences.cn: 一检查我就找出了这些质量低劣的货物.
sentences.en: On examination I found the goods of poor quality.

sentences.cn: 现在的软驱对质量低劣的软盘也能读取。
sentences.en: Today's floppy disc drives are tolerant of poor quality discs.

sentences.cn: 然而，全世界范围内，无论穷人还是富人中，都可以看到“将钱用到别人身上”和 “感觉更好”的联系，且对大部分人来讲，稀缺性提升了大部分事物的愉悦感。
sentences.en: Yet the link between feeling good and spending money on others can be seen among rich and poor people around the world, and scarcity enhances the pleasure of most things for most people.

sentences.cn: 他指出，不平等是危险的，不仅是因为富人和穷人之间的巨大鸿沟看上去就不好，更是因为它本身就破坏了向上的流动，让穷人更难摆脱贫穷。
sentences.en: Inequality is dangerous, he argued, not merely because it doesn ’ t look good to have a large gap between the rich and the poor, but because inequality itself destroys upward mobility, making it harder for the poor to escape from poverty.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 一些著名经济学家也表示由于贫富差距的拉大，如今，穷人更难在经济阶梯上向上爬了。
sentences.en: A number of prominent economists have also argued that it ’ s harder for the poor to climb the economic ladder today because the  rungs（横档） in that ladder have grown farther apart.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 向富人征收的税应该比穷人的多.
sentences.en: Taxes should be levied more on the rich than on the poor.

sentences.cn: 那些乱坟堆,都是解放前穷人的墓地.
sentences.en: Those mounds were the tombs of poor people before 1945.

sentences.cn: 公立医院源自殖民地时期政府为了救济穷人而建立的救济院中的医务所.
sentences.en: Public general hospital originated in the almshouse infirmaries established as early as colonial times by local governments to care for the poor.

sentences.cn: 他们组织了一个慈善机构帮助穷人和残疾人.
sentences.en: They organized a benevolent institution to help the poor and disabled.

sentences.cn: 不可在穷人争讼的事上屈枉正直.
sentences.en: Do not deny justice to your poor people in their lawsuits.

sentences.cn: 新税法正给穷人带来许多困难.
sentences.en: The new tax laws are causing the poor a lot of hardship.

sentences.cn: 过去,他们在城堡门口为穷人提供食物.
sentences.en: In the old days they would be feeding the poor at the castle gate.

sentences.cn: 穷人接受了救济.
sentences.en: The poor have accepted doles.

sentences.cn: 富人理应对穷人慷慨些.
sentences.en: The rich is in honour bound to be generous to the poor.

sentences.cn: 惹波兰先生生平从没有救助过任何穷人.
sentences.en: Never in his whole life had M. Geborand bestowed alms on any poor wretch.

sentences.cn: 他们帮助穷人.
sentences.en: They aided the poor.

sentences.cn: 所以感恩节一到, 她们就装上满清一篮食物亲自送到穷人家.
sentences.en: So one Thanksgiving, they loaded the Qing Dynasty to a basket of food to poor house.

sentences.cn: 一个拥有一切的人其实在某些方面是个穷人.
sentences.en: The man who has everything is in some ways a poor man.

sentences.cn: 那个地方解放前是富人的天堂, 穷人的地狱.
sentences.en: Before liberation, it's a paradise of the rich and a hell of the poor.

sentences.cn: 开支超过收入的人就是穷人.
sentences.en: He is poor whose expenses exceed his income.

sentences.cn: 高利贷者压榨穷人.
sentences.en: The usurer squeezed the poor people.

sentences.cn: 作为一个群体, 美国穷人与营养不良的距离很遥远.
sentences.en: As a group, America's poor are far from being chronically undernourished.

sentences.cn: 《卖火柴的小姑娘》是这样一个故事:它告诉我们穷人的艰难生活.
sentences.en: The Little Match Seller is a story that shows how hard poor live.

sentences.cn: 几乎所有的杂记都是关于穷人和性的.
sentences.en: Almost all these essays are about sex and poor people.

sentences.cn: 食品分发给了穷人.
sentences.en: The food was doled out to the poor.

sentences.cn: 认为家庭暴力只会发生在穷人中的看法是愚昧和错误的.
sentences.en: The assumption that such violence afflicts only the poor or deserving is both fatuous and misguided.

sentences.cn: 国王看了看那个穷人,又瞧了瞧那个小孩.
sentences.en: The King looked at the poor man and he looked at the little child.

sentences.cn: 穷人们相互撕杀.
sentences.en: The poor killed each other.

sentences.cn: 为了帮助非洲的贫穷人口而成立了一个新的组织.
sentences.en: A new organization is set up to help the poor in Africa.

sentences.cn: 穷人要翻身了.
sentences.en: The poor are turning their past upside down.

sentences.cn: 他的话使他的孩子对穷人抱有偏见.
sentences.en: His words prejudice his children against the poor people.
